website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are looking for an enzymatic supplement for your pet's digestive problems or to improve other aspects of her overall health, this product's broad spectrum enzymes are highly effective.
pros: In addition to improving digestive issues, this product's 8 enzymes can also reduce inflammation, decrease yeast development, and improve metabolism in some animals
Repeat users swear by its benefits for pets that are prone to diarrhea
cons: Some pets didn't like the flavor
Like most products in this category, it may not work for all dogs and cats, but it is very effective for most that try it

customer_reviews.title: He truly looked like he was going to die
customer_reviews.text: My dog has pancreatic insufficiency and this product saved his life. I tried raw beef pancreas and it didn't tolerate it. It made him vomit. Then I tried pancreatic enzymes but those gave him mouth sores. He was so skinny and his ribs were showing. He truly looked like he was going to die. With a bit of research I found enzyme miracle. A life saver to be sure. Since adding the recommended amount to my dog's food he's has gained all of his weight back , and then some, and his stools are formed and firm. This product is indeed a miracle. Thank you so much for saving my dog's life.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders for my feline friend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat who has been experiencing a lot of GI issues in his old age. He has also had pancreatitis and I'm certain it has come back a few times since his first diagnosis. I bought this on a whim hoping it would help my poor fur ball and within only three days of giving this to him not only did his coat improve, but he was his hyperactive young self again and is not as picky with his food as he was previously! This stuff is AMAZING! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Truly works!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old lab was diagnosed with lymphoscarnoma cancer 9 months ago. He has been on herbal supplements for treatment. I downloaded the cancer diet for dogs and read that enzymes are a must for dogs with cancer. He had trouble going #2 and was becoming gassy and nauseous as a result. I ordered this product along with a probiotic and it has really helped him. He now goes daily about 2 sometimes 3 times a day. He is much happier and comfortable. I started to see results with him around the third day of use.
customer_reviews.author: charsun

customer_reviews.title: GSD pancreatic digestive problems- no more diarrhea!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this product. My 6 month German Shepard had been suffering from chronic diarrhea for a while until my vet suggested he may have a pancreatic enzyme deficiency as many GSDs do. So after buying a $60 vet recommended brand he began to feel better however we could not afford those prices. This product is perfect and JUST AS if not MORE effective than the brand the vet tried selling us. It is worth EVERY penny and a huge money saver!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen

customer_reviews.title: Releasing the Nutrients in Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: As a dog nutrition nerd, I am aways researching for best feeding and supplement options. I home prepare food for my dogs and realize the importance of providing enzymes that they might consume in a wild environment, but NOT in my house. (Enzymes make food nutrients usable in the body of people and dogs. Research suggests that dogs in the wild increase their enzymes by eating a variety of animals and their stomach contents.) I feel this product by Nusentia meets those needs without subjecting them to allergens. Easy to sprinkle on their food and price is competitive with other brands. Accepted well by my 2 Bichons.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Help  4 your furbaby
customer_reviews.text: Have 1 dog with pancreatic insuffiency . This is great , works good for him and at half the cost of Rx item but the very same ingredients as in the Rx brand . Always check with your vet before switching. I did and was told it was OK to try. Glad I did and am saving $$$$ . Update - Now a year later this product has worked wonders . Mo is doing very well and gaining / holding weight . Vet says he's in great shape. Will keep using this !
customer_reviews.author: C. Crook

customer_reviews.title: We needed to double the dosage
customer_reviews.text: We decided to try the Nusentia because it was so much cheaper than Bio Case, and were pleasantly surprised that the dosage was so much less than what we had to give our German Shepherd with the other medicine. However, we've found that the dosage on the label is insufficient for her. Her poops were barely formed, a lot like when she was first diagnosed with PEID. So we are back to 1 teaspoon per cup of food. The tiny dosing spoon provided is ridiculous- they tell you to use a heaping scoop, but that is inexact & variable. If you decide to order this product, do your pet a favor & use a regular measuring spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has had problems with his pancreas. Even on a prescription food he goes through bouts of vomiting. He seems much improved since we began mixing these enzymes with his food. My fingers are crossed that he continues to do well. If he does it worth the price. UPDATE: I am sure these enzymes have helped. We are so glad we've found this product and since we don't want to be without it it should be clear we think it's worth the price. If you have a dog that has had problems with his pancreas I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: thesetwo

customer_reviews.title: Use of Enzyme Miracle eliminated daily acid /acid reflux stomach episodes!
customer_reviews.text: My just turned 8 y/o dog had developed some stomach acid issues . Began to have issues almost daily after years of no problems. He had been taking an enzyme product for years that worked well. Discovered it contained lactose and did not help digest protein. After a thorough exam by my vet, he advised me to give Pepcid. I began doing research and discovered older dogs sometimes required digestive help . I purchased the Nusentia Enzyme Miracle product and it was working so well I added the probiotic. My dog is doing awesome and have been able to eliminate the daily Pepcid. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A michalski

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my German Shepherd
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful that this would work for my EPI German Shepherd but it did not. Because of some of the reviews, I thought I would give it a try. Unfortunately his symptoms only got worse the longer I kept him on this product. I followed the instructions exactly. (I don't feel the product made him worse, just his EPI was getting worse) This is my experience only. Each EPI case is different. I'm not saying that it is a bad product, I'm just saying that it isn't right for MY dog. I knew that this was going to be a crap shoot. But this time I struck out. I'm moving on to try a new product.
customer_reviews.author: elirosieny

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs, two Italian Greyhounds (ages 16 & 17) and a German Shepherd (approx 10). In all three breath has been improved and the GS is acting like she dropped 8 years off her age. Paying attention to and educating yourself on diet is vitally important (for pets and people), especially in an increasingly toxic world. I don't think enzymes are a miracle, just plain common sense. This product has been very helpful for my pack and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ria B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Our Presa has allergies and a terrible yeast infection due to long-term antibiotics. All of the reviews and raves about this product had me curious. I purchased this product along with the probiotic and I must say approximately three weeks after starting these two products together, I've seen an increase of energy and less itching than I have in a long time. He even seems happier!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Susan

customer_reviews.title: This seems to reduce inflammation...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a staple in our doxies diet since our youngest became paralyzed and had back surgery. He recovered very quickly. Our dogs are 9,10,and 11. We all walk at least two miles per day. That ALOT for short legs! I believe this is a good product. My husband found it through research when our poor dog Frank N. Beans blew a disc. We think it's worth it. Currently it's our only supplement.
customer_reviews.author: stu

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully for my German Shepherd with low lipase.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has low lipase and needs his food mixed with enzymes. We had been using another brand but it was out of stock. I was apprehensive trying another brand because he had been doing so well. He's doing great on this brand and it's a little less expensive than the other so we will continue with this. Our dog eats 4 cups of food a day. The directions state to use 4 heaping scoops per cup of dog food but I have to use 6 heaping scoops. I wish they included an accurate scoop so customers could measure level scoops. But this product helps my dog so I continue to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: helped him better. I thought the formula was the same as ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that my dog does not just have a pancreatic enzyme deficiency. He has some congenital disease of the gut, and the enzymes do help to a degree. I followed these instructions to the letter, but I found that the powdered enzymes I had used before this, helped him better. I thought the formula was the same as enzymes by diane, so I can only assume the difference is that this is not in a powder. But this might work for your pet if they have an enzyme deficiency.
customer_reviews.author: BellaMare

customer_reviews.title: Enzyme Miracle is really effective.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product because my twelve year old standard poodle was having pain and other symptoms after eating. My dog was operated on for an insulinoma on his pancreas more than three years ago and I figured that he was not now able to secrete the digestive enzymes as his pancreas was now compromised. The effect of feeding him the Enzyme Miracle was quite quick and effective. All his digestive issues disappeared and he is a happy dog again. I am now on the second batch and also feed it to my younger standard poodle.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, though it is a great solution and price if it works
customer_reviews.text: If it works, it is a great solution and price for the product. Though for more heavy cases it will not work. We tried it for a couple weeks and had to go back to the pancreas enzyme powder. Though if it works it is a great price and healthier solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I realize I am probably in the minority, but my dog got sick when I started using this product. I continued to use it (half the dose suggested) for a couple of weeks, thinking it might be something else that made her ill. When I decided to stop using the product, she was better within 24-48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: CMA

customer_reviews.title: Saved my dog
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to keep my dog at a healthy weight for 6 years. We were at the point of deciding to put him down, we didn’t feel his quailty life was very good. He was constantly too skinny no matter what we did and had diarrhea. This powder had good reviews so I figured I would try it. I’m happy to say it has worked GREAT! I hope it continues to work and my dog will keep the weight on. As I said it’s been a 6 year struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: Broad spectrum vegetarian enzyme formula has been a game-changer for my dogs ...life is getting back to normal!
customer_reviews.text: I have had dogs on restricted diets for years, was still having periodic digestive troubles. My veterinarian suggested researching OTC enzymes. I settled on 3 different brands & formulas. After 6 months of use, this one works best for us. My dogs eat several times a day, and adding this product to each meal has so far completely eliminated the sudden outbreaks of diarrhea, etc. This has been a game-changer, especially for my dog diagnosed with pancreatitis. The cost is much less than prescription enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: TAugust

customer_reviews.title: Good product depending on pet's needs
customer_reviews.text: This product did not help my dog, but that's because she was later diagnosed with a pancreatic enzyme deficiency and required an enzyme powder for that particular condition. Enzyme Miracle would probably be effective for less serious digestive disorders. From research I did on using these enzyme powders, I learned it is vital to let the well-mixed food and powder "incubate" at room temperature for 15-20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kanaro

customer_reviews.title: Dog's don't know, Mom not convinced it does anything.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs don't even know it's on their food. I'm on my second container. I honestly cannot say whether or not it is "helping" because my dogs didn't really have anything wrong...I use it as more of a health initiative. It does not seem to help with digestion of things like beans or carrots, as I still see undigested remnants in their waste. Dog's food processes through their digestive systems so quickly, I'm not convinced thete is a benefit to using digestive enzymes unless they are put on the food well in advance. Sounds like an at-home experiment to me....
customer_reviews.author: Melisse

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We've been struggling for almost 10 months trying to find an enzyme formula that would help our German Shep/Austrailian Shep cross with EPI. He was down to 21 lbs and after hundreds of dollars this is the ONLY medication that has helped him to gain weight and no longer look like a malnourished and neglected animal. I will buy this over and over!
customer_reviews.author: shell

customer_reviews.title: I really feel this is a great supplement for our animals
customer_reviews.text: I really feel this is a great supplement for our animals. We add to our 12 year old dogs' and our cats food, in conjunction with the probiotics. Our cat has the shiniest softest fur and our old dogs look good and are moving around good. Was not able to get rid of a chronic yeast infection in our female's ear, but she looks shiny and healthy. I did recommend this and the probiotic to a friend, for her dog with hot spots, and it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: My dog eats it
customer_reviews.text: I mix it in her food and she eats it. That in itself is a plus. At the same time I started using the enzymes, I put her on a Histamine blocker, Hemp oil and another anti-itch product. She was already getting a liquid vitamin for dogs and was being fed special home prepared meals. She is doing better (not cured), and it is probably because of a combination of all this.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Software Products, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue Great Dane (actually 3) but our boy has diarrhea issues. They were quite bad, with many accidents in the house. Upon a suggestion from a friend we tried this product. Well, the results were and still are favorable. We use both enzymes and probiotics at each feeding. Luke has done much better with an occasional accident (mainly due to stress). The girls get it to and have noticed better coats, less gas, and over all well being. I would highly recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: CAK

customer_reviews.title: Little early to tell but it has helped. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Little early to tell but it has helped. Have a 15 year old pug who is diabetic since 2013, deaf, one eye & has dementia. He started losing weight from about 28 lbs 6 months ago, & went all the way down to 22.8. This has stopped the fall & hoping we can build him back up. But you can't expect too many miracles with an older pet, but thankful this product is @ least slowing down the process. Worth the money. Thanks Will report back if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Paul New

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog extremely sick
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so badly. My dog suffers from skin issues and various food intolerances. I started this product with high hopes, yet it made my dog sicker than ever. He had nonstop diarrhea for five days, after which his poop was straight blood. I discontinued immediately and it resulted in a $400 vet bill. I am happy that this product has worked for many dogs, but it caused an absolute nightmare for me.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Soares

customer_reviews.title: No more eating grass!
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to go outside and eat grass for maybe 10 minutes at a time. I know his stomach was upset because he would jump up out of a comfortable sleep and all of a sudden need to go outside. I started him on Enzyme Miracle (every meal) and he hasn't done that since. It's been 10 months now since he's had one of his long grass-eating episodes. He has had to go out a couple of times to eat grass, but that has only lasted maybe a minute or less and then he's fine. This product made a big difference in my dog's health.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: I researched this and we tried this and her digestion has been better than before
customer_reviews.text: We had been giving our dog prescription pancreatic enzymes. We switched vets and they would not transfer the prescription--which cost about $40 for 2 months of pills. I researched this and we tried this and her digestion has been better than before. Our dog is very finicky about eating new things, but she never even tastes this. Super cost effective too!
customer_reviews.author: J Gehron Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product my dogs love!
customer_reviews.text: I introduced this to my dog’s meal to help soften his stools a bit. He had an anal gland tumor and was struggling to defecate prior to using this product. It worked so much better than a stool softener did. So glad I found this product! He never objected to having the mix in his bowl and ate every last morsel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Corley

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working great
customer_reviews.text: My cat was diagnosed with pancreatitis and was barfing bile on a regular basis all over my house..he finally quit eating which sent me back to the vet ..... i felt so bad for him.. i read that enzymes could help.... this product got great review.. he seems to eat it fine once mixed with food.. which a no small feat with a cat...and he only now barfs the occasional hair ball.. he seems to be healthier and happier, which makes me happy too.. B
customer_reviews.author: Becky Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not for EPI dogs
customer_reviews.text: This enzyme may be great as a supplement for your average dog, but unfortunately it was not enough for our dog that suffers with EPI. She has been on porcine pancreatic enzymes and we switched to try this vegetarian product. It was unfortunately ineffective. Her poop began to get mustard yellow and soft after about 2 weeks and she experienced some anal discharge and weight loss as well. I felt this information would be very helpful for any pet owners who are looking to treat their pet’s EPI.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: A miracle
customer_reviews.text: To make a long story short our 11 year old Neopolitan Mastiff has been on Pancrezyme for at least 8 yrs. The vets said she had to be on it for life. The supplier was completely out so we took a chance on Enzyme Miracle for a third of the price...her stomach and digestive issues seem to be even better with this product. Sorry I didn't take the chance earlier in her life, so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Nussbaum

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to write reviews but this product has worked miracles in my two golden retrievers. They are 9 years old and have been having problems with scooting and foul gas despite changing their diet, trying pumpkin and probiotics. This stuff worked right away and continues to work. Very economical too. Highly recommended and will continue using.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L. Palazzo

customer_reviews.title: High Hopes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to help my dog with IBS. We have used this product for 1 month. Things have been very slowly been improving a little since adding this product. Will have to see where this leads.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I started feeding my dogs raw a few months ago and have added in the Nusentia Miracle Digestive Enzyme for each feeding and it has made a difference in my 3 year old dog who was having difficulty digesting the raw diet at first. I order this probably every 4-6 weeks for my dogs and wouldn't feed raw without it. I also use the Nusentia probiotics as well at each feeding. Wonderful product! I wouldn't consider the other brands as I know that Nusentia is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: akamp

customer_reviews.title: Ok price, quality very good
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has allergies, & this seems to help with his ears & paws. I've also lost a dog due to liver cancer at 3 yrs ole, so read up on dietary needs, which suggested this type of product, due to what's not in dog food today. Hoping this gives my dogs a long healthier life.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L Mardesich

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help
customer_reviews.text: I got this to go along with The Probiotic Miracle which has helped save my dogs life from a rare intestinal disease. I didn’t notice any difference in my dogs with this product. They do eat it well mixed in their food. They actually like the taste of it and get excited when I have the container out. After a few months I have decided I won’t be reordering this when it runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Nio

customer_reviews.title: I think this is doing some good..
customer_reviews.text: I think this is doing some good.... I have a GSD that has EPI. I am feeding him a lower fat, lower fiber diet along with this and a pro-biotic to boot...he seems to be starting to slowly gain weight back... I have been using this for about 3 weeks now...we'll see...fingers crossed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe more time is needed for the miracle to show up
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am not blown away by amazing and quick results as I have been using this product along with the Nusentia Miracle Probiotic powder for a month. I am persevering, however, and hope my golden retriever's skin condition will improve. He is already on a limited ingredient, raw diet and so again, maybe a few more weeks with these products will prove to be highly beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Helped my Wire Fox Terrier
customer_reviews.text: My Wire has allergies and has had issues with itching and ear infections. No matter how careful I was with his food, he still fought regular ear infections. He has not had a single ear problem since I started using this and Probiotic Miracle. It seems to work for my pup.
customer_reviews.author: elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My Saint Bernard was puking up his food every time after he ate but immediately once I started these enzymes he stopped. They seem to have no taste because he gets a lil ground beef and warm water with his food and doesn’t notice me adding the powder in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baral

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Our poor Airedale had been suffering with skin issues for the past 4 years. Several trips to the vet, tried almost every brand of grain free dog food, all kinds of topical treatments, etc. He was bald on his back half from chewing and scratching. He would cry from pain of scratching, it was so sad. Since we have been giving him the enzymes along with salmon oil he has grown back all of his hair, he no longer scratches himself and his terrible body odor is gone!! This is truly a miracle product and I will continue to use it forever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working great for my dog.. No more gas or just being smelly
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday for my dogs. My older dog really had an issue with gas and just stinking. I gave him probiotics for a couple of months and that helped somewhat with the smell but he still had bad gas... After using this for a week I noticed no more gas :) I no longer have a stinky dog!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Absorbing nutrients is a big step to healing
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 senior dogs, two with serious health issues that I'm treating holistically. I believe adding the digestive enzymes is a big part of the puzzle. Wished I had started it earlier since they eat a home cooked diet. Absorbing the nutrients in their expensive organic foods is a big step to healing, in my opinion. I just wish the product was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more eating dirt
customer_reviews.text: I am a veterinary technician and I have a german Shepherd with chronic pancreatitis and likely IBD. When he has a flare, he tends to eat dirt which in turn makes him more ill. I am on my second container or this product and am happy to report that neither of my dogs are eating dirt anymore, which is evident in the clean water bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for my EPI German Shepherd Dog
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, and no smell like some animal-based enzymes! I give this to Mac my 16-month-old GSD with EPI along with some B-12. He had stalled out on his weight gain when the EPI developed. With the help of Enzyme Miracle Mac has started to gain weight and fill out.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great product for doggy upset stomach.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and works for my Plott Hound. She was eating a lot of grass and could not hold much down sometimes. Once I started giving her this in her food 1-2x daily, she does not eat grass and has been able to keep food down and feels a lot better. I feed my dog Diamond dog food which was recommended by our vet and has always worked great with our dogs. The servicing is small but effective and she does not seem to mind the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue-Tri-Coach

customer_reviews.title: It works great on my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I buy this along with their probiotics and it's called the Miracle Pack. It works great on my dogs, you use a very small amount (spoon included) and my dogs cannot taste it. I have one dog that sniffs everything and refuses to eat things with certain items sprinkled on them. This has not been an issue with these. Great product. Will keep reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work at all for my dog's allergies and his skin bumps!. There is no directions on how much to give your dog according to the weight. I don't know if the 5 star reviews were staged or not, but I should of went by the 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: girleygirl555

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use. I put it in canned cat food since my cat picked up the scent of it in her dry food. When I add water to it, it smells a bit like liver to me. She doesn't taste it in the canned foods like she did the hemp oil I was using before this product. It has helped my cat with vomiting.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Still I am not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was hoping for my dog’s diarrhea to finally clear up...nope it didn’t work and she doesn’t seem to like the taste of it! I’m still putting it in her food...maybe it will work before the container is empty. After just over a month of use, there has been no change, sorry, but I will not be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Traci V.

customer_reviews.title: Pancreatitis
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a pancreatitis attack in March. Once he was stable and put on a low fat diet, I added this to his meals. His numbers went from the 2000s to 45 (it is now almost June). So, I am not sure this is helping but it definitely hasn't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: N. Macklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After doing a ton of research, we settled on using Nusentia Probiotics and Digestive enzymes about 10 years ago after one of our dogs started displaying signs of serious food sensitivity. It worked wonders and we plan to continue using it going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: LEFT IN HOT MAILBOX.
customer_reviews.text: Was left in hot mail box. Product was hot. Is it now useless. I am NOT happy. Supposed to be kept in dry cool place. Package should say not to leave in mailbox. I’m living on SS, this is not a cheap product and now it’s probably no good. I can’t buy again for a while. Guess my dog will have to suffer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gossenreiter

customer_reviews.title: After confirming with vet + my research my GSD 90lbs ...
customer_reviews.text: After confirming with vet + my research my GSD 90lbs had pancreatic enzymes deficiency so he was not processing food properly. Since I started using this product everything is back to normal. Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: alye khan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! My Shepherd could not hold food down ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! My Shepherd could not hold food down and had constant diarrhea and vomiting. Vet told me he would have to be placed on a very expensive program, well this product cured him and now he's gained weight and back to normal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 yr old IBD cat who developed EPI. Her meds weren't working and she was literally wasting away. I bought this on a whim and within days her stool harden up to normal. She is slowly putting on weight and her IBD flare-ups are few and far between. I feed her Lotus rabbit pate mixed with Stella & Chewy freeze dried rabbit with a scoop of Nusentia at each small but frequent feedings. I am so grateful I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing recovery!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever is 14 yrs. Old, had cancer twice and two strokes. Since the intake of the enzymes she has been able to keep her food down and her new energy is a miracle. She has a bald patch on her back which seems to be growing hair now. I'm thrilled with her recovery!! So grateful after only two wks.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Had been going through the local vet and they were overpricing me each time I refilled. Last bottle of an 8oz. Cost me 120. I'm so glad that I found this product. Way cheap and works great. No side effects on my German shepherd mix. She's very happy and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kamui13

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Breath
customer_reviews.text: I have large & very small dogs and sprinkle the powder on their kibbles. I have noticed an improvement in my small dogs breath, so I am very happy with this product! None of the 4 seem to have any adverse reaction to it. I did introduce it slowly to their food, working up to a full dose.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Frank and Maggie Won't Eat It!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this product works or not! My cats can smell it in their food, and they won't eat the food! So disappointed, because I really do believe that at least one of my cats needs digestive enzymes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey5200

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY CAT
customer_reviews.text: my 15 yr old cat is like a kitten and only been on this for a week both cats have nicer softer coats i mix it into their food so i assume the taste is agreeable since they eat it all
customer_reviews.author: ellen low

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown.
customer_reviews.text: It took my dogs a little while to get used to this powder on the food, but now it is not an issue. Everyone's coat is softer. I got it specifically to see if it would help with poop eating, but I am not sure at this point of it is helping with that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quantity.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was that the little spoon would work its way down into the powder and I would have to dig it out. I can’t say I have seen any kind of noticeable change in my dogs coat, digestion or behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Knock on wood that it'll keep it away for good!!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping with cronic pancreatic issues, 8 year old doxie hasn't had it since I started her on this & Probiotics for Dogs on Nov. 17th ... Knock on wood that it'll keep it away for good!!
customer_reviews.author: Snite

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: Nusentia enzymes is a life saver for both my baby Chloe and my wallet! I was paying $178 for the same product but different company’s brand. Their enzyme made my pups mouth smell like mildew. And with the other place I HAD to have a prescription for it which postponed her doses for about two weeks when they requested a prescription. With you guys I had it within a couple of days and I can’t say thank you enough! She also seems to be more energetic and happier since I started her on this.
customer_reviews.author: daniel real

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Dogs With Digestive Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. He is almost 10 and was having a lot of really painful digestive issues. I combined the enzymes with a low fat high protein diet for him and the change is remarkable. He has so much energy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: FLReader

customer_reviews.title: helps with digestive problems
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this on my dogs meals. I have one girl who was getting sick at least twice a month. I added this to the food and she has no more digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: michelle chase

customer_reviews.title: This stuff rocks. My BC was getting crazy diarrhea ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks. My BC was getting crazy diarrhea out of the blue every once in a while (after being on the same food for years, so it wasn't the food). I add this to his food at every meal. He likes the taste, cleans his bowl. Haven't had a problem since adding this to the food! :) It's expensive, but it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SilverFlame819

customer_reviews.title: Great Enzyme Product For Dogs
customer_reviews.text: "Love this product! It contains all natural ingredients that are good/necessary for maintaining the health of my fur babies! Easy to just sprinkle in their food."
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tomosawa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs raw and it was recomended to me to be added to their foods to help with digestion. After one use our dogs did not have runny stool and after about a month, their coats are vey shiny and less shedding. It has no smell and my dogs never notice it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as porcine enzymes for my Chow
customer_reviews.text: These plant based enzymes work great for my dog with pancreatic enzyme issues. I've tried the more expensive porcine based enzymes and did not notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Myron

customer_reviews.title: Digestive enzyme works.
customer_reviews.text: Have this to our put because we give him an all natural diet. In other words , no processed dog foods and his digestive tract is great. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the results of giving this product to my youngest German Shepherd. He used to have loose stools occasionally, but since I have been giving him Nusentia enzymes the loose stools have stopped. Thank you for a great product. Will be buying more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: German Shepherd Lover

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Tried just the raw diet but results not ...
customer_reviews.text: Enzymes really help my dog get maximum digestion & hopefully nutrition from his raw food diet. His poop is much smaller. The probiotic has helped with his eye discharge & can be used at triple strength after a course of antibiotics if your dog needs them. Highly recommend. Tried just the raw diet but results not the same. Easy to sprinkle on food & no trouble with dog rejecting it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Unfotunately it did not work as advertized. It was supposed to help allergies but instead created them. I wrote to nusentia asking them about the herbs used in this product. I wanted to know if it had the same plants to which my dog is allergic to. They refused to answer because of commercial reasons. I think that consumer laws must be different there, because in my country products must be clearly stated what substances it contains. So, I'm dissapointed yes. I lost money, not only with the product but in custom payments also. Yours Maija Harju
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this added to their food my Dog has severe ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this added to their food my Dog has severe food allergies and I must cook for him 2x daily this helps me know that he is getting the right amt of enzymes. His stools have gotten better and his coat looks good now if we could get some weight on him thank you for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: 364 scoops even tho bottle is 1/2 full
customer_reviews.text: The container I got was only 1/4 full. Mfg says this is normal, and its sold by weight, seems to work, my dog has pancreatitis so to soon to tell. I just mix in his food & he doesnt know its there.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working!
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog is now having mostly near-normal stools. I've changed his diet, used vet-approved meds but this supplement seems to be what has tipped him toward normalcy. Not perfect but is helping.
customer_reviews.author: Jane About Town

customer_reviews.title: Extra nutrition for our rescue dogs
customer_reviews.text: We add this to our mastiffs food for extra nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee

customer_reviews.title: Odd review for a gross dog habit
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, very expensive for 2 large dogs. One dog has health issues and this was recommended. HOWEVER, we also had a poop eater, and I read someplace enzymes might be missing. We tried all kinds of things to get her to stop her from being gross, none of it worked. Then after doing this for a month, she stopped eating poop!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: no more gas or bloat and much better bowel movements
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a lot of gas for a month before I decided to use this. It has worked wonders, no more gas or bloat and much better bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Molls

customer_reviews.title: Best price that I have found and value is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a greyhound and he couldn't gain the weight back after retiring. This product helped him! I saw significant differences in three days!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Matthews

customer_reviews.title: All good ingredients, no filler crap
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients shown are just good. No extra stuff. Dogs like it, easy to use. One dog no longer has tear stains.
customer_reviews.author: Munchkin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs had horrible allergy issues and this really helped!! She's itching less and not eating her paws off!
customer_reviews.author: nan b.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fur babies!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It has helped my dogs with their stress while we are away and has majorly improved my English Mastiffs shedding! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Acla Oh

customer_reviews.title: Senior Dogs Do Great On This
customer_reviews.text: I give this to my senior dogs, and they are doing great. My dogs are 11, 12 & 13 years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful
customer_reviews.text: Our dog had severe pancreatitis. His digestive system was permanently injured due to the severity of his illness. These enzymes have helped him to once again have firm poo and not so bad of horrid gas. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed our dog's life, and quite frankly ours as well. He was sick for 6 weeks and nothing we did helped. I was doing research and came across Nusentia enzymes. He can now eat without getting sick and I add it to all of our animal's food, every single time and will never stop using it or switch to any other product, though I WILL add more Nusentia products to the pet's diets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No improvement in skin condition issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help treat my Labrador's severe skin allergy condition. After reading several strong reviews that this helped, it was worth a try. I even tried double doses, but no improvement in my case. Our vet says that if the dog's pancreas is working properly, these enzymes will be readily available naturally. Can't hurt, but probably won't help. I'll finish the product, but will not replace it. Perhaps it works on dogs with inefficient pancreas activity?
customer_reviews.author: Dave V.

customer_reviews.title: For lovely hairy elbows
customer_reviews.text: i bought it to help with my lab's allergy related digestive issues which it really does. As a bonus, he is suddenly growing the hair back on his callused elbows.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked wonders helping to get this foster dog back to health. He has gained 21 lbs in the first 5 weeks using this product. His skin lesions healed. He is now running and plsying ball. A very happy healthy GSD. We are now on our third order and Jackson is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems healthier!
customer_reviews.text: My Great Dane eats it sprinkled on his dry food with every meal along with probiotic miracle. We originally got it to help his digestive problems. He doesn't seem to mind me adding the powder to his food. He has been having much less diarrhea, and his coat has gotten much softer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rice

customer_reviews.title: My dog has chronic pancreatitis and after putting Enzyme Miracle ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has chronic pancreatitis and after putting Enzyme Miracle in his low fat diet, he is a new dog!!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to home-cooked diet
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my dogs' daily supplements since switching them over to a home-cooked diet. I made sure to do it slowly and I think this really helped with their smooth transition. No diarrhea or upset stomach. Highly recommend this product if you're cooking your dog's meals.
customer_reviews.author: ltpkpnc

customer_reviews.title: Saved our rescue boy
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue dog with a very sensitive stomach. Any stressful or new situation made his stomach upset and he wouldn't eat. Our vet suggested enzymes. And it has worked! We are diligent about giving this to our boy every day. And now it has been months since he has had a bad stomach. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: loverly

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: It is working wonders for my dog who was really struggling. Much better now. I showed my doctor the container and he was very impressed and told me never stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristene Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Best enzyme product out there for small dogs...and cats. small enough amount that they will eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

product_meta.title: NUSENTIA Enzymes for Dogs & Cats - Enzyme Miracle - Systemic & Digestive Enzyme Formula - Powder - 364 Servings - Vegetarian
feature_bullets: ★ 11 types of plant-based systemic and digestive enzymes. Formulated for dogs and cats of all ages and stages, even puppy, kitten, and senior pets. A perfect compliment to probiotics supplement, omega-3, glucosamine, chondroitin, and msm supplements. Tastes great and easy to use, your pet won't even know the tiny amount of powder is mixed in their food.

★ 1 economical scoop supports complete nutrient absorption for great health — Helps avoid digestive stress, indigestion, toxin build-up, yeast issues, and developing pancreatic issues. Your dog (or cat) will feel great again when you bring their diet closer to raw with this natural, concentrated enzyme blend. Contains premium Bromelain, a powerful anti-inflammatory, metabolic enzyme, and proteolytic enzyme for streamlined health and digestion.

★ 100% Natural - 100% Safe - Unflavored Powder - Easy Dosing - No Byproducts - No Wheat - No Dairy - No Eggs - No Soy - No Flavorings - No Animal Ingredients. Perfect for dogs and cats eating a processed or cooked diet. Renders cooked diets closer to raw with a super premium blend of enzymes that break down fats, carbohydrates, proteins, fiber, even yeast and fungus! Your pet will feel great and experience reduced shedding, improved allergies, vibrant skin and coat, and natural energy.
★ 100% Quality Tested - Made in USA at GMP certified facility. Veterinarian Recommended.

★ Recommended for dogs and cats of all stages and ages. A perfect supplement to natural and specialty dog foods and cat foods (ie: Blue Buffalo). Premium quality. Third party tested. Incredible value, delivers hundreds of servings.
